meanings.sent1: The inconscient cat slept soundly through the storm.
meanings.sent2: She walked past the inconscient plants without noticing them.
meanings.sent3: The inconscient phone kept ringing, but no one picked it up.
meanings.sent4: His mind was an inconscient void, devoid of any thoughts.
meanings.sent5: The inconscient student missed the entire lecture while daydreaming.

meanings.definition: Unconscious or unaware of one's surroundings
meanings.sent1: The inconscient child wandered aimlessly in the park.
meanings.sent2: He was so inconscient of the noise around him that he didn't hear the alarm.
meanings.sent3: The inconscient driver missed the turn because he was lost in thought.
meanings.sent4: Her inconscient state made her vulnerable to the dangers lurking nearby.
meanings.sent5: The inconscient patient didn't flinch during the surgery, showing no signs of pain.
